name: Top Hat Terror
description:
Controls:

  • Move left and right with arrow keys or "A" or "D"
  • Press "up" or "w" to use shops.
  • Press Spacebar to jump.

Objective:

  •  Get to spaceship and leave planet.  
  • Collect money to stay alive.
  • Collect money to get a cooler hat!

Story:

This world has gone bad and for some reason only money can keep you alive.  For some reason every action tends to result in losing money though, so you need to act fast and get off this horrible planet!  Everyone has given into greed and bought top hats to prove it.  Don't lose you hat!  These are special hats that grow along with your bank accounts.
